analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.assignTokenContract (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b08b0b558a2ff86860c4bd55f69aefbf4f50e50.sol#433-442):
	External calls:
	- hardCap = hardCap.add(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b08b0b558a2ff86860c4bd55f69aefbf4f50e50.sol#436-440)
	- hardCap > token.hardCap() (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b08b0b558a2ff86860c4bd55f69aefbf4f50e50.sol#440-441)
	- hardCap = token.hardCap() (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b08b0b558a2ff86860c4bd55f69aefbf4f50e50.sol#441)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- hardCap (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b08b0b558a2ff86860c4bd55f69aefbf4f50e50.sol#441)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b08b0b558a2ff86860c4bd55f69aefbf4f50e50.sol#449-465) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b08b0b558a2ff86860c4bd55f69aefbf4f50e50.sol#460-461)
